name: Chat App
summary: A single-room chat app using websockets

childComponents.name: Chat Room
childComponents.summary: A single chat room for users to communicate in

childComponents.name: Message List
childComponents.summary: A list of messages sent by users in the chat room

childComponents.name: Message
childComponents.summary: A single message sent by a user in the chat room

childComponents.name: Message Text
childComponents.summary: The text of the message sent by a user in the chat room

childComponents.name: Message Timestamp
childComponents.summary: The timestamp of when the message was sent by a user in the chat room

childComponents.name: Message Input
childComponents.summary: A text input for users to type messages in the chat room

childComponents.name: Input Field
childComponents.summary: A text field for users to type messages in the chat room

childComponents.name: Send Button
childComponents.summary: A button for users to send their messages in the chat room
